title: RD - Wham, Bam, Thank You Ma'am
itunes:title: RD - Wham, Bam, Thank You Ma'am
description:
Adam and Mark connect for an early in the week in studio episode and they come out of the gates hot watching and analyzing some comments from Washington Commanders Defensive Coordinator Jack Del Rio discussing his views on January 6th. They also give an update on the Geico story covered in the latest BARD and discuss an interview given by Amber Heard to The Today Show. As the show wraps up Adam gets Mark's take on another football related case headed to SCOTUS soon.

Watch this episode & subscribe on YouTube at YouTube.com/AdamCarolla
